## CustomOpArguments type

Digs out custom operation arguments, mapped to the intended graphql types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CustomOpArguments<Shape extends CustomOperationParamShape> = Shape['arguments'] extends null ? never : ResolveFieldRequirements<{
    [FieldName in keyof Shape['arguments']]: Shape['arguments'][FieldName] extends BaseModelField<infer R> ? R : Shape['arguments'][FieldName] extends EnumType<infer Values> ? Values[number] | null : never;
}>;
```
**References:** [CustomOperationParamShape](./data-schema.customoperationparamshape.md)<!-- -->, [ResolveFieldRequirements](./data-schema.resolvefieldrequirements.md)<!-- -->, [BaseModelField](./data-schema.basemodelfield.md)<!-- -->, [EnumType](./data-schema.enumtype.md)
